timeline.message:
Add sub-project dropwizard common

The sub-project is to allow for easier configuration
of a drop wizard server and to reduce redundancy for when
we have multiple drop wizard servers

timeline.bodyText: That's a weird side-effect I didn't see coming. Maybe renaming the method to document this bahaviour in some way?
timeline.author: RoiEXLab

replies.bodyText: "addWebsockets" might be better. I'll note that the method is not static precisely because it has such a side-effect (IMO it's a bit sad that the keyword is considered optional, even bad practice, as the omission of the static keyword could otherwise be used to derive pretty useful information).
replies.author: DanVanAtta
